trends: There have been 72 other sightings in Nashville
There were 2 other sightings in Nashville on or around May 31st 2009
Summary: Object appears, then follows commercial airliner into Nashville.
divs: sighting detailsat 8:30pm i began setting my scope up for a night of sky watch. the sky was crystal clear and the temp about 79. i was finishing setup when my better-half stepped out and was saying something, then she said "look...a light just came on near that plane." i looked and saw a commercial airliner had decended it's approach from the west and was some 30 miles out from nashville international airport at an altitude of maybe 2500-feet. the light that she refered to was almost suspended in mid-air as the plane continued past it. i then saw this light slowly accelerate into an arc until it was now flying directly behind the airliner at 1\4 mile...at nearly the same altitude, and following at a slightly slower speed. i quickly turned my scope on the plane to check the focus, which was dead on, and then back to the light which was following. i could clearly see that the object was grey\black, 20'-25'long est., maybe 1\3 airliner cabin depth, and had a bright duffused light underneath it. the light did not appear to be a projecting light, but an energy source light and very brilliant-white. another peculiar oddity is that the object appeared to have a clear jellatin-like shroud or watery cloud around it. it almost appeared to have an excitatory-static appearance as it flew thru the air. i have seen this light several times this month in the same area of sky at night, but never this early in the evening. there were only a couple of bright stars out with the moon, and there was enough sunset light for me to recognize the plane as an inbound delta flight. this ojbect that i witnessed @ 35x at a distance of 1-1\4 miles was not an airplane. it was nothing that i have ever seen before, and thats all i have to say about it!
